chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (n c d : nat) (g : naryFunc (S n)) (h : naryFunc (S (S (S n)))), extEqual n (evalPrimRecFunc n (g d) (fun x y : nat => h x y d) c) (evalPrimRecFunc (S n) g h c d)

Premises:
naryFunc = fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end : nat -> Set Arguments naryFunc _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
evalPrimRecFunc : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc (S (S n)) -> nat -> naryFunc n
extEqual : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc n -> Prop
extEqualPrimRec : forall (n : nat) (g1 g2 : naryFunc n) (h1 h2 : naryFunc (S (S n))), extEqual n g1 g2 -> extEqual (S (S n)) h1 h2 -> extEqual (S n) (evalPrimRecFunc n g1 h1) (evalPrimRecFunc n g2 h2)
reduce2ndCompose : forall (c n m : nat) (v : Vector.t (naryFunc n) m) (n0 : naryFunc n) (g : naryFunc (S (S m))), extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n (S (S m)) (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) n0 (S m) (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) (evalConstFunc n c) m v)) g) (evalComposeFunc n (S m) (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) n0 m v) (fun x : nat => g x c))
filter0011IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 4 (fun _ _ c d : nat => g c d)
filter1011IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 g -> isPR 4 (fun a _ c d : nat => g a c d)
ind2ParamIsPR : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 4 f -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 3 (fun a b c : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) (g b c) (fun x y : nat => f x y b c) a)
PrimRec_rec : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_sind : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> SProp, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Type, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop, P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m) (h : PrimRec m), P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
reduce1stCompose : forall (c n m : nat) (v : Vector.t (naryFunc n) m) (g : naryFunc (S m)), extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n (S m) (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) (evalConstFunc n c) m v) g) (evalComposeFunc n m v (g c))
compose2_2IsPR : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> forall h : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 h -> isPR 2 (fun x y : nat => h (f x y) (g x y))
VectorDef.shiftrepeat = fun A : Type => @VectorDef.rectS A (fun (n : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n)) => VectorDef.t A (S (S n))) (fun h : A => VectorDef.cons A h 1 (VectorDef.cons A h 0 (VectorDef.nil A))) (fun (h : A) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)) (H : (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => VectorDef.t A (S (S n0))) n v) => VectorDef.cons A h (S (S n)) H) : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)), (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => VectorDef.t A (S (S n0))) n v Arguments VectorDef.shiftrepeat {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
PrimRec_PrimRecs_ind : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Prop), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRec_PrimRecs_rec : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Set), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n : nat) (p : PrimRec n), P n p
PrimRecs_PrimRec_rec : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Set) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Set), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P0 n n0 p
PrimRecs_PrimRec_ind : forall (P : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> Prop) (P0 : forall n n0 : nat, PrimRecs n n0 -> Prop), P 1 succFunc -> P 0 zeroFunc -> (forall (n m : nat) (l : m < n), P n (projFunc n m l)) -> (forall (n m : nat) (g : PrimRecs n m), P0 n m g -> forall h : PrimRec m, P m h -> P n (composeFunc n m g h)) -> (forall (n : nat) (g : PrimRec n), P n g -> forall h : PrimRec (S (S n)), P (S (S n)) h -> P (S n) (primRecFunc n g h)) -> (forall n : nat, P0 n 0 (PRnil n)) ->...-> forall (n n0 : nat) (p : PrimRecs n n0), P0 n n0 p
extEqualTrans : forall (n : nat) (a b c : naryFunc n), extEqual n a b -> extEqual n b c -> extEqual n a c
extEqualCompose2 : forall (n : nat) (f1 f2 : naryFunc n), extEqual n f1 f2 -> forall g1 g2 : naryFunc (S n), extEqual (S n) g1 g2 -> extEqual n (compose2 n f1 g1) (compose2 n f2 g2)
ind1ParamIsPR : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR 1 g -> isPR 2 (fun a b : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) (g b) (fun x y : nat => f x y b) a)
VectorDef.shiftout = fun A : Type => @VectorDef.rectS A (fun (n : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n)) => VectorDef.t A n) (fun _ : A => VectorDef.nil A) (fun (h : A) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)) (H : (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => VectorDef.t A n0) n v) => VectorDef.cons A h n H) : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)), (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => VectorDef.t A n0) n v Arguments VectorDef.shiftout {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
extEqualOneParamList : forall (n m : nat) (l1 l2 : Vector.t (naryFunc (S n)) m) (c : nat), extEqualVector (S n) m l1 l2 -> extEqualVector n m (evalOneParamList n m c l1) (evalOneParamList n m c l2)
compose2 : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc (S n) -> naryFunc n
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n), P n (VectorDef.cons ?A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n)), P n v where ?A : [ |- Type]
replaceCompose2 : forall (n : nat) (a b a' b' : naryFunc n) (c c' : naryFunc 2), extEqual n a a' -> extEqual n b b' -> extEqual 2 c c' -> extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n 2 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) a 1 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) b 0 (Vector.nil (naryFunc n)))) c) (evalComposeFunc n 2 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) a' 1 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) b' 0 (Vector.nil (naryFunc n)))) c')
indIsPR : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f -> forall g : nat, isPR 1 (fun a : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) g (fun x y : nat => f x y) a)
compose3_1IsPR : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR 1 g -> isPR 3 (fun x y z : nat => g (f x y z))
compose3_2IsPR : forall f1 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 f1 -> forall f2 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 f2 -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 3 (fun x y z : nat => g (f1 x y z) (f2 x y z))
projectionListApplyParam : forall (m n c : nat) (p1 : m <= n) (p2 : m <= S n), extEqualVector n m (projectionList n m p1) (evalOneParamList n m c (projectionList (S n) m p2))
pi4_4IsPR = let H : 0 < 4 := le_S 1 3 (le_S 1 2 (le_S 1 1 (le_n 1))) in exist (fun p : PrimRec 4 => extEqual 4 (evalPrimRec 4 p) (fun _ _ _ d : nat => d)) (projFunc 4 0 H) (fun _ _ _ c2 : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 4 (fun _ _ _ d : nat => d)
compose3_3IsPR : forall f1 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 f1 -> forall f2 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 f2 -> forall f3 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 f3 -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 g -> isPR 3 (fun x y z : nat => g (f1 x y z) (f2 x y z) (f3 x y z))
VectorDef.t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
VectorDef.t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Type), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
compose2_1IsPR : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR 1 g -> isPR 2 (fun x y : nat => g (f x y))
VectorDef.tl = fun A : Type => @VectorDef.caseS A (fun (n : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n)) => VectorDef.t A n) (fun (_ : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n) => t) : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t A (S n)), (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => VectorDef.t A n0) n v Arguments VectorDef.tl {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
compose4_2IsPR : forall f1 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 4 f1 -> forall f2 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 4 f2 -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 4 (fun w x y z : nat => g (f1 w x y z) (f2 w x y z))
compose4_3IsPR : forall f1 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 4 f1 -> forall f2 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 4 f2 -> forall f3 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 4 f3 -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 g -> isPR 4 (fun w x y z : nat => g (f1 w x y z) (f2 w x y z) (f3 w x y z))
Fin.rectS : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) -> Type, (forall n : nat, P n Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p -> P (S n) (Fin.FS p)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p
filter011IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 3 (fun _ b c : nat => g b c)
filter101IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 3 (fun a _ c : nat => g a c)
primRecFunc : forall n : nat, PrimRec n -> PrimRec (S (S n)) -> PrimRec (S n)

```coq
intros n c d g h.
apply extEqualPrimRec.
- apply extEqualTrans with (evalComposeFunc n (S (S (S n))) (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) (g d) 1 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) (fun x y : nat => h x y d) 0 (Vector.nil (naryFunc n)))).
  + apply extEqualCompose2.
    * apply extEqualPrimRec.
    * apply extEqualTrans with (evalComposeFunc (S n) (S (S n)) (Vector.cons (naryFunc (S n)) g 1 (Vector.cons (naryFunc (S n)) h 0 (Vector.nil (naryFunc (S n)))) (fun x : nat => d)).
      { apply extEqualCompose2.
        - apply extEqualTrans with (evalComposeFunc n (S n) (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) g 0 (Vector.nil (naryFunc n))) h).
          + apply reduce1stCompose.
          + apply extEqualTrans with (evalComposeFunc (S n) n (Vector.nil (naryFunc n)) (fun x : nat => h x d)).
            * apply reduce2ndCompose.
            * apply reduce2ndCompose.
        - apply extEqualPrimRec.
      } 
    * apply extEqualPrimRec.
  + apply extEqualTrans with (evalComposeFunc (S n) (S (S n)) (Vector.cons (naryFunc (S n)) (evalPrimRecFunc n (g d) (fun x y : nat => h x y d) c) 1 (Vector.cons (naryFunc (S n)) (fun x y : nat => evalPrimRecFunc n g h c x (d)) 0 (Vector.nil (naryFunc (S n))))).
    * apply reduce2ndCompose.
    * apply reduce2ndCompose.
- apply extEqualPrimRec.
Qed.```

original: intros n c d g h. apply extEqualPrimRec. -
